Egress.definition: the action or right of going or coming out 2
Egress.origin: [Medieval Latin egressus , literally, act of going out, departure, from Latin, from egredi to go out, from e - out + gradi to make one's way]

1.definition: the action or right of going or coming out

2.definition: a place or means of going out or exiting compare[i-gres] vito go or come out
